DOC.brief_summary: The objective study compare standard coronary CT angiography scan protocol conventional image reconstruction scan protocol use reduce tube current new image reconstruction algorithm . The investigator hypothesize image quality new scan protocol inferior , radiation dose estimate reduce around 30 % . Secondary endpoint study include quantitative image quality parameter , prevalence non-diagnostic study , prevalence coronary artery plaque plaque characteristic ( calcify , non-calcified , mixed ) prevalence follow-up examination .
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Randomized Trial On Radiation Dose Estimates Of CT Angiography In Patients Applying Iterative Image Reconstruction Techniques - The PROTECTION V Study -
DOC.criteria: 1. patient indication coronary CT angiography ( plan evaluation coronary artery ) 2. sign inform consent 3. stable sinus rhythm 4. age > 18 year 1. know allergy contrast agent . 2. patient know coronary artery disease 3. pregnancy 4. stable sinus rhythm 5. coronary ct examination focus coronary artery
